about_the_game:
Currently, not all features listed below are available. We are a small studio and are developing Space One - Electron as fast as we can.


We start in deep space, in a small ship called the 'Electron'.
• Explore the universe, its stars, worlds and moons.
• Mine asteroids, gas clouds, ice fields, and comets to gather resources.
• Construct space stations and space colonies and grow your galactic empire!
• Craft ship parts, character armor, buildings and so much more!
• Manage colony resources through manual labour or through commanding drones, robots and workers to harvest for you!
• Buy, sell and trade resources at various colonies you create in an attempt to establish a home for humanity amongst the stars.
• Construct space farms, to feed your people, fuel your research and expand your empire!
• Research hundreds of techs used to advance yourself and your colonies!
• Improve your ship, buy new ships and improve your skills to aid you in every part of the game!
• Explore planets, and construct planetary colonies in a glorious attempt to gain galactic supremacy!

detailed_description:
Discord

Join our discord community, and join us through the development process!


The Development Process

My name is Andy and I am the developer of Space One - Electron!

I have massive plans for this game!
However, I want to be completely transparent with you all!
This game is an indie title and is built by just me! I work on it about 30-40 hours per week, and have a full time career and a family as well.

To give you a idea of how much work goes into a game:
Call of Duty is made by a team of 60+ people @ 12 hours per day. Each iteration (Version) takes about 3 years to make. That's 690,000+ hours of development!
Space One - Electron has a little over 1,200 development hours so far! It is a long way from finished!!!

What I can promise:
- There will be bugs!
- Some updates will get delayed, even cancelled!
- The planned content may change!
- It will take 3-5 years to be fully ready.
- Work and Family will always come first!
- You may lose save games!
- The final product of this game will be ABSOLUTELY EPIC!

Buying the game is a way to support the growth and development of the game, and be a part of that process.
This is what early access is all about!
However, if you are not ready to handle bugs then I do not recommend you buy the game at this time!
I do, however, encourage you to join our community on discord and follow our progress!
